statements: SELECT * FROM market_data ORDER BY symbol ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, price, volume FROM market_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT symbol, volatility FROM market_data WHERE volume > 1000 AND volatility < 0.005 ORDER BY volatility ASC LIMIT 20
SELECT symbol, timestamp FROM market_data WHERE symbol IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL') ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT AVG(price) AS 'average_price', MAX(volume) AS 'max_volume' FROM market_data
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT symbol, volume FROM market_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY volume ASC;
SELECT symbol, timestamp, volatility FROM market_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND volatility < 0.005 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, AVG(volume) AS avg_volume FROM market_data WHERE symbol IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL', 'MSFT');
SELECT * FROM pricing_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, stock_symbol, price FROM pricing_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM volatility_data GROUP BY stock_symbol;
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(volatility) AS avg_volatility FROM volatility_data GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING AVG(volatility) > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM pricing_data WHERE date = '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM pricing_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM pricing_data GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING COUNT(stock_symbol) > 5;

SELECT p.stock_symbol, p.price, v.volatility FROM pricing_data p JOIN volatility_data v ON p.stock_symbol = v.stock_symbol WHERE p.price < 50 AND v.volatility > 0.1 ORDER BY p.price ASC, v.volatility DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, MIN(price) AS min_price, MAX(price) AS max_price, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM pricing_data GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING MIN(price) < 25 AND MAX(price) > 100;
SELECT stock_symbol, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM pricing_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' GROUP BY stock_symbol ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT symbol, date, open_price, close_price, volume FROM historical_pricing;
SELECT symbol, date, volatility FROM volatility_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, date, risk_score, risk_category FROM market_risk_analysis WHERE risk_score > 0.5;
SELECT symbol, date, volatility FROM volatility_data WHERE symbol='AAPL';
SELECT symbol, date, risk_score, risk_category FROM market_risk_analysis ORDER BY risk_score DESC, date ASC;
SELECT symbol, date, open_price, close_price, volume FROM historical_pricing LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, date, volatility FROM volatility_data WHERE volatility > 0.05;
SELECT symbol, date, risk_score, risk_category FROM market_risk_analysis ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, AVG(open_price) AS avg_open_price, AVG(close_price) AS avg_close_price FROM historical_pricing GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT symbol, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM volatility_data GROUP BY symbol HAVING total_entries > 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_pricing WHERE security_id = 1001;
SELECT security_name, price FROM historical_pricing ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM historical_pricing;
SELECT security_name, trade_date FROM historical_pricing WHERE trade_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT volatility_date, volatility FROM volatility_data WHERE security_id = 2001 AND volatility > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM historical_pricing WHERE security_id = 1 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT security_name, price FROM historical_pricing WHERE trade_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price, security_id FROM historical_pricing GROUP BY security_id;
SELECT security_name, volatility FROM historical_pricing JOIN volatility_data ON historical_pricing.security_id = volatility_data.security_id;
SELECT security_name, risk_score FROM historical_pricing JOIN risk_analysis ON historical_pricing.security_id = risk_analysis.analysis_id WHERE risk_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM historical_pricing ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_risk_analysis WHERE risk_score > 0.5;
SELECT id, date, volatility FROM volatility_data WHERE volatility < 0.02 ORDER BY volatility ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data_sources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT symbol, risk_score FROM market_risk_analysis WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_pricing WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM historical_pricing GROUP BY symbol HAVING AVG(price) > 100 ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT symbol, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM historical_pricing WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' AND date <= '2021-12-31' GROUP BY symbol
SELECT symbol, date, volatility FROM volatility_data WHERE symbol = 'GOOG' AND volatility > 0.05 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT symbol, risk_score FROM market_risk_analysis WHERE risk_score >= 0.8 ORDER BY symbol, date DESC
